title: Easy, Fast & Real
text: You will have an application where you can scan TrueQRCodes. A searchable list (on multiple phones) where you can find everyone who signed up. Easy financials with graphics to know how everything is going in real time. ...Not bad eh?

section.title: Why Us?
section.content: We are not a big company. We do it for everyone, but good. We are true.

section.title: Set your own rules?
section.content: Yes, the whole idea is you are the owner. So you set the rules for the event, and add the description you want. There is a private chat also between the host and the guests. Be smart.
